channel.title: Range bug
channel.description: Hello im using the base PI and i got this weard range bug i got perfect combat but just a bug you see if i hit some one with range the uppest hit is 0 and the down one is the hit how do i delete that a normal bow hits twice [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/t7bg9y.png[/img] however if you hit a npc with range it looks normal but its player vs player

item.title: Range bug
item.dc:creator: @justhin10 justhin10
item.description:
@justhin10 wrote:

Hello im using the base PI and i got this weard range bug i got perfect combat but just a bug you see if i hit some one with range the uppest hit is 0 and the down one is the hit how do i delete that a normal bow hits twice

however if you hit a npc with range it looks normal but its player vs player
